forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 18C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
